name: Fast ActiveCampaign
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Fast Active Campaign is designed to work seamlessly with both the Fast Flow Dashboard and Fast Member

Once your contacts have been added to WordPress you now have the ability to sync their Fast Tags and Fast Member purchases.

Fast Tags can be used to trigger automations on any other integrated platform which is supported by our growing number Fast Flow addons.

NOTE: Fast ActiveCampaign requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to enter the API details and utilise the user tagging.

(https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/)

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

(https://fastflow.io)
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to enter the Active Campaign API settings.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the settings of the Fast Flow Dashboard and enter your Active Campaign API details.

Fix for Fast Forms

1.1.3

Update for Fast Form action

1.1.2.1

Bug fix Connector.class.php on line 155

1.1.2

  • Addition of webhook URL to receive tag add and remove data from Active Campaign API

1.1.1

  • Sanitize, escape, and validate POST calls inline with WordPress guidelines

1.1.0

  • Prepared for repository release

short_description: Easily Sync ActiveCampaign Contacts With Your WordPress Users. Direct user tagging integration through the Fast Flow Dashboard.
